overview: Miscreant girls get put in their place by hot lesbians in charge. In the second edition of Sweetheart's new popular strap-on series, beautiful lesbians enjoy being strapped and gently dominated. Personal assistant August Ames gets caught slacking on the job, and boss Angela White must discipline her. Kissa Sins must contend with her angry lesbian lover, played beautifully by Natalia Starr. Natalia will not tolerate cheating from Kissa, and teaches her a lesson. Popular college girl Charlotte Stokely has been taking advantage of nerdy, straight-A student Penny Pax for far too long. Penny lets Charlotte know that she will not take things lying down. Set designer Dana DeArmond is disappointed in assistant Zoe Clark's work performance and decides to show her exactly what must change.
title: Lesbian Strap-on Bosses Vol. 2
